name: Fix the Cave
description:
This little game was made for a small <2-day jam with friends in Unity Brighton offices :D

The dude's running and jumping by himself but he needs your help to destroy boulders and close gaps!! (Click them to destroy)

Alt-f4 to quit

There's a known bug that prevents the dude from running, just restart the game if it happens

Made with Unity

Music from http://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/fast-ace/

Art made with https://www.aseprite.org

Sound effects made with http://www.bfxr.net/
